title: Strategic HR Ð How to turn your talent into a revenue enabler
summary: The marketplace today is a dynamic one for HR. As tenures of leaders grow shorter and implementation cycles of projects shrink, HR leaders are compelled to achieve business outcomes as quickly as possible, says Raj Sundarason, VP, HR LoB Solutions, SAP Asia. Also, the next generation HR leader has to accelerate driving the inefficiencies of back office operations out of the business so that HR is really able to get more out of employees, effectively turning human capital into a true revenue enabler.
